### [**Biography**]{.smallcaps}

| Hello, visitor, thank you for stopping by! I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Epidemiology at [Johns Hopkins University](https://publichealth.jhu.edu/) (since 2023). Prior to this, I underwent a year of Biostatistics Master training at [Renmin University of China](http://stat.ruc.edu.cn/Home/index.htm) (2022-2023) under the guidance of [A. Prof. Yu Wang](http://stat.ruc.edu.cn/Home/People/Faculty/01eb35dbf5fe41588f82d3150ffcf409.htm).

My academic journey began with a B.Eng degree (2018-2022) earned at [Zhejiang University](https://www.zju.edu.cn/english/), where I was under the supervision of [Prof. Yu Zhang](https://person.zju.edu.cn/en/yzhang#0). I feel fortunate to have engaged in research collaborations with [Prof. Ming Chen](https://bis.zju.edu.cn/binfo/), [Prof. Baiyi Lu](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Baiyi-Lu-2), and [A. Prof. Li Li](https://person.zju.edu.cn/en/lili). I am dedicated to enhance my professional skills in the combination field of **BIOS & BIOINFO & EPI** and cultivate the ability of innovation.

### [**Research Interest**]{.smallcaps}

I am particularly intrigued by the integration of aging indicators (e.g. frailty, biological age), age-related disease (e.g. cognitive decline, CVD), and omics (e.g. metabonomics, GWAS).

Furthermore, how to combine biostatistical (e.g. causal inference, functional data) and machine learning (e.g. Boosting, Stacking) into medicine are also drive my interest.
